SEARCH
Module photos60
Package users

Interface ManagePhotos

public interface ManagePhotos
Interface for managing photos in albums. Provides operations for adding, removing, copying, and moving photos.
Author:
Group 60

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addPhotoToAlbum(String albumName, Photo photo)
    Adds a photo to an album.
    boolean
    copyPhotoToAlbum(String sourceAlbum, String destAlbum, Photo photo)
    Copies a photo from one album to another.
    boolean
    movePhotoToAlbum(String sourceAlbum, String destAlbum, Photo photo)
    Moves a photo from one album to another.
    boolean
    removePhotoFromAlbum(String albumName, Photo photo)
    Removes a photo from an album.

  • Method Details

    • addPhotoToAlbum

      boolean addPhotoToAlbum(String albumName, Photo photo)
      Adds a photo to an album.
      Parameters:
      albumName - the name of the album
      photo - the photo to add
      Returns:
      true if the photo was added, false if it's a duplicate

    • removePhotoFromAlbum

      boolean removePhotoFromAlbum(String albumName, Photo photo)
      Removes a photo from an album.
      Parameters:
      albumName - the name of the album
      photo - the photo to remove
      Returns:
      true if the photo was removed, false if it wasn't in the album

    • copyPhotoToAlbum

      boolean copyPhotoToAlbum(String sourceAlbum, String destAlbum, Photo photo)
      Copies a photo from one album to another.
      Parameters:
      sourceAlbum - the name of the source album
      destAlbum - the name of the destination album
      photo - the photo to copy
      Returns:
      true if the photo was copied, false otherwise

    • movePhotoToAlbum

      boolean movePhotoToAlbum(String sourceAlbum, String destAlbum, Photo photo)
      Moves a photo from one album to another. The photo is removed from the source album and added to the destination album.
      Parameters:
      sourceAlbum - the name of the source album
      destAlbum - the name of the destination album
      photo - the photo to move
      Returns:
      true if the photo was moved, false otherwise
